function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Exclusion of 25 participants providing professional care for covid-19 patients increases the risk of bias in the final sample.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative emotions leading to lower compliance with quarantine measures","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unclear rules leading to lower compliance with quarantine measures","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived capacity and knowledge affecting compliance with quarantine measures","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concordance between self-report and objective compliance measures differs based on the method of assessment","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with stay at home and social distancing measures","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Self-reported behavior studies may not capture the full extent of compliance with social distancing measures","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive studies on compliance factors for covid-19 mitigation measures","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Social distancing measures not being followed","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of compliance with stay-at-home orders","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in sustaining long-term compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Effectiveness of compliance with mitigation measures","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gig workers continue to work despite covid-19 symptoms, increasing the risk of disease transmission","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential repetition of covid-19 type events in the future","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Health workers facing physical and mental health risks due to long working hours and shortage of protective equipment.","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in maintaining treatment for chronic conditions, such as access to dialysis","category":"Poor access to Diagnostics and Treatment","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Chronic under-funding of the world health organization who leading to limited resources for global health governance.","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Weak public health systems unable to manage population-wide approaches","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overworked hospital staff and overburdened facilities due to covid-19","category":"Healthcare resource shortage and management","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on remote collaboration and control in industrial iot may lead to greater spread of contagious diseases if not managed effectively.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Changes in travel patterns and behaviors due to covid-19 may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases in transportation networks.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on online services may lead to a reduced physical presence in brick-and-mortar stores, potentially impacting public health and safety.","category":"Public health messaging and education","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unwillingness or inability to invest in specialized medical devices or wearables","category":"Lack of effective medical solutions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low threshold healthcare iot services may lead to inaccurate or unreliable medical data.","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased use of iot in industrial settings may lead to higher risk of disease transmission due to increased interaction with shared equipment and spaces.","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of covid-19 due to ineffective vaccine roll-out strategies","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of uv light for vehicle cabin cleaning may not be effective in eliminating all contagious pathogens","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate compliance with sops by uber drivers due to unreliable facial mask detection","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate monitoring of indoor air quality and occupancy in public transport","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of ineffective disinfection and cleaning leading to virus spread","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of misidentification of high-risk areas for disinfection","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate visitor management leading to potential spread of covid-19","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased time spent at home leading to higher risk of contagious disease spread","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Slow vaccine rollout leading to low vaccination rate","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to covid-19 through iot devices and technologies","category":"Workplace safety and occupational exposure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Propagation of viruses through touch surfaces and shared spaces","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of response to preventing virus propagation pvp2 in the health & safety category","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of response to wastewater management wwm1, wwm2, wwm3 in the health & safety category","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of pathogens through air and water systems","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to green space and nature resulting in poor mental and physical health","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High percentage of respondents lack a green view from the window, increasing the risk of limited access to natural environments.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Clear majority of respondents reported missing urban green spaces ugs during the period of closure, indicating a high demand for access to nature.","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Frequent visitation of ugs during the covid-19 pandemic","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Perceptions of ugs during home quarantine","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased travel to green areas outside residence","category":"Lack of access to health services","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious and infectious diseases spreading through close contact","category":"Failure to results","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Data collection concurrent with covid-19 pandemic","category":"Misinterpretation of data and results","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Restrictions on ugs visitation during the pandemic","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rapid increase in positive cases due to initial allowance of outdoor activities leading to stricter restrictions.","category":"Failure to implement preventive measures","confidence":"High"}]}
